title: "Unable to connect to Pvp.net" Launcher error HOW CAN I FIX IT
body:
So it has been 3 days since this error message popped out from the _**goddamn**_  Windows (7) launcher, when you have to insert Username and Password. I tried everything: doing all the passages from this useless page D: (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944), reinstalling LoL, changing my MAC address, repairing it from the launcher. 
I don't have a router because I'm directly connected to the Internet via LAN, so I don't even know if a port forward can be made nor how. I thought it would have been only a matter of hours, but the situation didn't slightly change. I can't even imagine different solutions. 
I even tried using the terminal "_ping pvp.net_" command as admin but the packages went all lost and the requests were always timed out (I've tried that on another computer (iMac) too and the answer was always the same so it isn't a Pc problem). It worked well for 3 years and now I can't even play.

If someone knows hot to fix this (I've tried all solutions so other forum discussions are useless for this case), or how to directly port forward a network interface controller, please save me. Asks everything you want if you need something.

replies.body:
Hi, we are in the italian forum so you can speak italian if you want.
Did you change the DNS? If not, try to set them on google ones. The address are 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4.

Ah già scusate è che credevo di essere localizzato sulla Lingua Inglese. Errore mio.

Comunque sì ho tentato a cambiare il DNS ma non ha sortito nessunissimo risultato. Le ho davvero provate tutte :/
Già ho fatto anche quello e non ne ho ricavato assolutamente nulla. A parer mio il problema sta nella connessione, ma non so come risolverlo.
Ormai credo ti rimanga solo da chiamare il tuo provider
